answers.answer: increased hungerincreased thirstfrequent urination and greater amounts than normalsudden onset of bed wettingweight lossfatigueirritabilityIt is hereditary - if you have family that is diabetic. You want to keep the child from becoming over weight as that increases the chance the diabetes will develope as the child gets older.
